metaTags.content: Gather your ingredients, let the soup simmer on the stove, and get ready to savour the authentic flavours of this Tortilla Soup. Whether enjoyed as a standalone meal or as part of a festive spread, this recipe is a testament to the joy of simple, hearty, and delicious homemade soups.

structuredData.name: Tortilla Soup
structuredData.description: Gather your ingredients, let the soup simmer on the stove, and get ready to savour the authentic flavours of this Tortilla Soup. Whether enjoyed as a standalone meal or as part of a festive spread, this recipe is a testament to the joy of simple, hearty, and delicious homemade soups.
recipeIngredient: 1 can Black beans (15oz; rinsed and drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the chicken breasts into cubes and cook them. Put aside
In a large pot, sauté onion in oil. Once onion is cooked add garlic, chili powder, oregano, cumin and stir.
Add crushed tomatoes, chicken broth, corn, black beans, cilantro, cooked chicken, and bring to a boil.
Turn heat down and simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring every so often.
Serve with chips, avocado, cheese and sour cream on top.
